background_prompt: The sky is ablaze with color as the sun sets. Long, dramatic shadows fall across the scene. The handrail gleams softly in the golden light. In the distance, the building is bathed in a warm, amber glow.

title: Hazy Summer Morning
description: A light haze hangs in the air, creating a soft, diffused atmosphere. The handrail is dewy in places. The vegetation is lush, and the large building looms gently through the haze, suggesting a warm day ahead.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: The hazy morning light gently illuminates the rough stone, softening the appearance of its cracks and surface textures.
background_prompt: A light haze hangs in the air, creating a soft, diffused atmosphere. The handrail is dewy in places. The vegetation is lush, and the large building looms gently through the haze, suggesting a warm day ahead.

title: Rustic Pathway
description: The area feels secluded, with dense greenery and fewer signs of modern life. The handrail is rusty but sturdy. Overhead, trees create a canopy filtering the sunlight, and the building in the background is old and weathered.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: The stones are crude and irregularly shaped, providing a rustic charm. Tiny plants grow in the larger crevices.
background_prompt: The area feels secluded, with dense greenery and fewer signs of modern life. The handrail is rusty but sturdy. Overhead, trees create a canopy filtering the sunlight, and the building in the background is old and weathered.

title: Thick Snow Cover
description: Everything is blanketed in heavy snow. The handrail is nearly buried. Trees are heavily laden with snow, and the entire scene is under a soft, white cover. The background building is partially obscured by falling snow.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: The stone slabs are covered in a thick, white layer of snow, with only the rough outlines and edges visible.
background_prompt: Everything is blanketed in heavy snow. The handrail is nearly buried. Trees are heavily laden with snow, and the entire scene is under a soft, white cover. The background building is partially obscured by falling snow.
